document.full_text: brandt snedeker rallied to defeat luke donald in a playoff at the heritage in hilton head island, s.c., allowing lee westwood to move atop the world golf rankings.
document.title: golf roundup: westwood moves to no. 1 as donald loses playoff
lines_and_colors: brandt snedeker rallied to defeat luke donald in a playoff at the heritage in hilton head island, s.c., allowing lee westwood to move atop the world golf rankings.
